title: Mou Shantao
text:
Mou Shantao (; born 1 March 1990, in <a href="Dalian">Dalian</a>) is a <a href="Chinese%20people">Chinese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="CP%20Villarrobledo">CP Villarrobledo</a>.
Club career.
Mou Shantao started his professional football career in 2010 when he was promoted to <a href="Nanjing%20Yoyo">Nanjing Yoyo</a>'s first squad. In July 2011, Mou signed for <a href="China%20League%20Two">China League Two</a> side <a href="Fushun%20Xinye">Fushun Xinye</a>. In March 2012, Mou transferred to <a href="China%20League%20Two">China League Two</a> side <a href="Guizhou%20Zhicheng">Guizhou Zhicheng</a> and he was part of the team that won the <a href="2012%20China%20League%20Two">2012 China League Two</a> division. In March 2014, Mou transferred to <a href="China%20League%20One">China League One</a> side <a href="Shenzhen%20F.C.">Shenzhen F.C.</a>. 
On 26 February 2016, Mou transferred to <a href="Chinese%20Super%20League">Chinese Super League</a> side <a href="Henan%20Jianye%20F.C.">Henan Jianye</a>. On 13 March 2016, Mou made his Super League debut in the second match of 2016 season against <a href="Chongqing%20Lifan">Chongqing Lifan</a>. 
Career statistics.
"Statistics accurate as of match played 31 December 2020."
Honours.
Club.
<a href="Guizhou%20Hengfeng%20F.C.">Guizhou Hengfeng</a>
